title: You are My Heartbeat
overview: Sila is the vice-president of the GU Group, he does not tolerate lies and dirt. He rarely touches anything unless absolutely necessary. One day he meets a beautiful designer girl, she is his complete opposite. The beauty is constantly cheating and quite sloppy. They have to work together. In addition to everything, the girl's ex-boyfriend is the younger brother of the Force. When a clean girl meets a dirty girl, a firework of emotions is guaranteed! Dislike or love - which will win?
